Writer: Kirk Jones, Giuseppe Tornatore (original screenplay), Tonino Guerra (original screenplay), Massimo De Rita (original screenplay)
Title: Everybody's Fine
Actors: Robert De Niro, Drew Barrymore, Kate Beckinsale, Sam Rockwell
Plot: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
